channel.description: Recent content in The Billing Folder on CSI Knowledge Base

item.title: Folder Structure
item.description: Under Construction This page under construction. Subject to change. The billing folder is broken down into the following nested folder structure: # Nested Folder structure Billing Customer Name Job folder # Example Billing Skier Construction 1234 - Customs Office Fence Builders 1235 - Shoreline 1242 - The Lab Folders in Detail Billing This is the top-level folder where all Customer folders can be found. Customer Name This is the Customer-specific folder where all job folders for a given Customer can be found.
